about_the_game:
Important:

• If you already have the Keiler in your Garage, you will receive 3,250 gold as compensation.
• If you already have the Exterminator camouflage, you will receive 3,200 gold as compensation.

This bundle includes:

• Keiler Collector tank (Germany, heavy, Tier VIII)
• Garage slot
• 9 equipment slots
• Exterminator Legendary camouflage for the Keiler
• Blitz MP Corps attachment
• 10 Rare Combat XP boosters
• 10 Rare Free XP boosters
• Cook’s Camper Legendary animated avatar

"Keiler" is German for "boar"—the perfect name for this tank. It has strong frontal armor, sidescreens, and a thick gun mantlet to deflect hits. Its penetrating gun and 80 tons of weight can inflict damage with shells or by ramming, and its impressive dynamics will certainly catch enemies off guard!

This DLC bundle can only be added to your World of Tanks Blitz account once.
